about_the_game:
Overview

Step into the infernal hut of 'Nevermind this', a drive-crazy horror game that takes place in deep woods. Mike, a lumberjack who has been living and working alone for more than a couple of decades, one freezing winter evening as usual returns home. It was supposed to be a usual routine evening. Supposed. The game challenges you to face your deepest fears as you navigate through a labyrinth of confusion, solitude, chaos, and distraction. As you move through the cursed hut, you must ignore the strange and unsettling surroundings and manage to survive the unknown horrors that are hiding in the dark.

The Main Gameplay Highlight

In 'Nevermind this' you are thrust into a dark and foreboding world where every turn hides something new. The game features a mix of first-person exploration and adventure gameplay, as you must find solutions to many paranormal and blizzard situations. Gameplay forces you to doubt truthfulness of your surroundings. Experience unpredictable events, weird stuff and surreal scenes. The game's dynamic environment is designed to keep players on edge and in a state of constant fear, with unexpected scares and challenges around every corner.

The Atmosphere

The cursed hut at the heart of 'Nevermind this' is the home of a mysterious and lonely Mike-the-old lumberjack. The only thing that can remind us about civilization is the railway. As you explore the hut and the surrounding area, you will uncover clues and hints about the history of the lumberjack and the curse that has befallen the area.

content_descriptors.notes: Our game includes such mature content as: dead bodies, blood, swearings, scenes of violent acts on simplified mannequins, weapons, scary sounds and screamers, and similar things that can cause fear, gore, suicidal and serial killer references.
